definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: This blind old lady relies completely on her walking stick to walk.
sentences.chinese: 这个瞎眼的老婆婆完全依靠拐棍走路。

sentences.english: The blind young man makes a living by singing .
sentences.chinese: 那位瞎眼年轻人通过卖唱来谋生。

sentences.english: And if ye offer the blind for sacrifice, is it not evil?
sentences.chinese: 你们将瞎眼的献为祭物，这不为恶吗。

sentences.english: 13They brought to the Pharisees the man who had been blind.
sentences.chinese: 他们把从前瞎眼的人带到法利赛人那里。
瞎眼的老鼠，火枪手，命运。

sentences.english: You are going to be blind, and for a time you will be unable to see the light of the sun.
sentences.chinese: 你要瞎眼，暂且不见日光。

sentences.english: Is this the one you say was born blind? How is it that now he can see?
sentences.chinese: 你们说他生来是瞎眼的，如今怎么能看见了呢？

sentences.english: At the windy window the widow finds a blind snake winding.
sentences.chinese: 在当风的窗口寡妇发现有条瞎眼蛇在忧嫰。

sentences.english: They brought him to the Pharisees, the man who had formerly been blind.
sentences.chinese: 他们把从前瞎眼的人，带到法利赛人那里。

sentences.english: The lamed bridegroom touched the blind bride on the arm to get her attention.
sentences.chinese: 瘸腿新郎碰了碰瞎眼的新娘，以引起她的注意。

sentences.english: When you bring blind animals for sacrifice, is that not wrong?
sentences.chinese: 你们将瞎眼的献为祭物，这不为恶么。

sentences.english: MOCK】The naughty boys mocked the blind beggar.
sentences.chinese: 顽皮的孩子嘲笑瞎眼的乞丐。

sentences.english: Blind anole still has the ability to change color to adapt to surrounding environment.
sentences.chinese: 瞎眼的变色龙，还是有能力变色来适应周遭环境的。
一个标准的瞎眼万事通。
你们这瞎眼领路的有祸了。

sentences.english: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind.
sentences.chinese: 他们把从前瞎眼的人带到法利赛人那里。

definition: my old mother/I, this old woman/my old lady (colloquial)/maternal grandmother/midwife
to open one's eyes/to widen one's horizons
